name: Attack of the clump
description:
A young mole descends into the earth while being pursued by a big meanie of a clump. Traverse through a beautifully illustrated world that got cut out of the game and collect all of the little cutie worms. Colour not included.

Oliver Loescher - Programmer / Level Designer
Joshua Christian Bonin aka Mr. Sir. Dying-von GoatFetus Jr - 2D Artist
Rexcy Jones Ricablanca - 2D artist 

Shawn MCadam - Music
